## MapEnv class

Adds access to map specific environment properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MapEnv extends Env 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [unmap()](./harp-datasource-protocol.mapenv.unmap.md) |  | Return an object containing all properties of this environment, takes care of the parent object. |
